attributes.long-description:
With this pack of new player costumes for Guacamelee!, you can stop in at any save point in the game to change your appearance. Enjoy a fresh look and a unique set of game-changing upsides and drawbacks for each:

POLLO LUCHADOR: You’ll love the soothing caress of your always-regenerating health just as much as the soothing caress of your full-body chicken suit. Is that velvet?

SKELETON: Undead luchador not undead enough for you? Become even MORE undead! Tear through your enemies with the implacable stamina of an angry, brittle bone-person -- but don’t expect much help from health pickups...

IDENTITY SWAP: Let Tostada take over the hero job in the guise of ‘Juanita’. This alternate form for the main character has tougher punches but can’t throw for beans.

Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS3™ system and PS Vita system versions!

1 player(s)
Network Features
1000KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Cross-platform play (PS3™)

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

attributes.name: Guacamelee! - Costume Pack 1
